description: Standard green leaves texture with natural variation

base_colors.note: Exact colors from TextureAtlas.java case 7: r = 30 + leafNoise * 60, g = 100 + leafNoise * 80, b = 20 + leafNoise * 40

dark_spots.description: Natural leaf shadows and darker areas

color_adjustment.note: Subtle darkening for natural leaf shadows

light_specks.description: Red berries/flowers from actual game implementation

color_adjustment.note: Transform to exact berry colors RGB(220,30,30) from TextureAtlas.java case 7

edge_transparency.description: Edge transparency from actual game implementation

generation_algorithm.step1: Generate triple noise: sin(x*0.9 + y*0.6)*0.25 + cos(x*0.7 + y*0.9)*0.25 + sin((x+y)*0.8)*0.5
generation_algorithm.step3: Apply base colors: r = 30 + leafNoise * 45, g = 100 + leafNoise * 70, b = 20 + leafNoise * 35
generation_algorithm.step4: Apply dark spots at pattern coordinates (subtract deltas)
generation_algorithm.step5: Apply edge transparency for pixels within 2 pixels of edge
generation_algorithm.step6: Clamp all color values to [0, 255] range
generation_algorithm.note: Triple noise generation similar to snowy leaves but with brighter base colors

metadata.created_from: TextureAtlas.java regular leaves texture generation - inferred from snowy leaves
metadata.purpose: JSON conversion of standard LEAVES texture algorithm

validation_notes.pattern_complexity: Triple noise generation with natural shadow patterns
validation_notes.coordinate_system: Uses global coordinates for seamless tiling
special_features: RGBA format with alpha channel variations
